description: Featuring a slim, compact design, the Belkin USB 2.0 4-Port Ultra-Mini Hub (F5U407) lets you connect up to four peripherals through a single open port on your laptop for full functionality anywhere you go. Ideal for use with USB devices including storage drives, card readers, cameras, external CD/DVD players, and printers, the Ultra-Mini Hub supports USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 connections. In addition, plug-and-play installation makes adding it to your existing mobile system quick and easy.USB 2.0 4-Port Ultra-Mini HubAt a Glance:Compact design ideal for travel4 downstream ports with data transfer rates up to 480MbpsCompatible with both USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 devicesConvenient plug-and-play installationBacked by a lifetime warrantyThe slim, compact design is ideal for travel.View larger.High-Speed Convenience with Four USB 2.0 PortsThe Belkin USB 2.0 Ultra-Mini Hub features four USB 2.0 downstream ports for fast, efficient data transfers at speeds up to 480Mbps. And it's backward compatible with USB 1.1 devices, which means you can keep older-generation peripherals up and running while maximizing the high-speed performance of new devices.Compact, Travel-Ready Design with Cord-Free PowerLightweight and compact, the unobtrusive Ultra-Mini is easy to tuck into a pocket in your laptop bag or carry-on, which makes it easy for you to use USB devices anywhere that you use your laptop. In addition, the Ultra-Mini requires no external power supply, which reduces cord tangles and clutter in your laptop bag. A convenient indicator light makes monitoring the Mini-Ultra's signal status simple.Plug-and-Play InstallationA plug-and-play setup gets the Ultra-Mini up and running quickly and easily. Simply connect it to your computer using a USB cable (sold separately),  follow the on-screen directions, and start connecting devices.System Requirements and Warranty InformationThe Ultra-Mini Hub works with a broad range of systems. For PC Users, it supports use with Windows 98, 2000, ME, XP, or Vista. For Mac Users, it supports OS 9 to OS 10.The Belkin USB 2.0 4-Port Ultra-Mini Hub is backed by a lifetime warranty.What's in the BoxUSB 2.0 4-Port Ultra-Mini Hub and manual.USB HubsUSB 2.0 4-PortUltra-Mini HubHi-Speed USB 2.04-Port HubHi-Speed USB 2.0 7-Port Lighted Hub (Black)Hi-Speed USB 2.0 7-PortLighted HubHi-Speed USB 2.0 7-PortMobile HubPorts44777USB 2.0YesYesYesYesYesUSB 1.1YesYesYesYesYesUSB PoweredYesNoNoNoNoAC PoweredNoYesYesYesYesUSB HubsUSB 2.04-Port HubUSB 2.0 PlusHub (4 Port)USB 2.0 Plus7-Port HubHigh-Speed USB 2.07-Port Hub2-in-1 USB 2.07-Port HubPorts44777USB 2.0YesYesYesYesYesUSB 1.1YesYesYesYesYesUSB PoweredNoNoNoNoNoAC PoweredYesYesYesYesYes
title: Belkin USB 2.0 4-Port Ultra-Mini Hub
